title: Nissan Recalls Nearly 42,000 Sentras Over Windshields With Dangerous Air Bubbles
description: Nissan has issued a new safety recall covering 41,797 units of the 2025 Sentra after discovering that some windshields may contain visible air bubbles that violate federal safety standards. title: Modern Porsche 911 Gets Unexpected 996-Inspired Makeover
